name: Escape from Sylon 6
overview: Escape from Sylon 6: In this adventure you take on the role of a member of the (crew of moon base Sylon 6. The base has been attacked by the Spectras, a pirate-like band of aliens who roam the (galaxies attacking peaceful settlements and capturing the (inhabitants to use as their (slaves. Fortunately, for you, you were in the observation dome and saw through the telescope the Spectras' space ship) (approaching. You did not have (enough time to sound the alarm) (all you could do was hide as the Spectras overran the base.) Your only chance at survival will be escape!
